definition: cytosine nucleotide (C, pairs with guanine G 鳥嘌呤|鸟嘌呤 in DNA and RNA)
uracil nucleotide (U, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in RNA)
thymine nucleotide (T, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in DNA)

sentences.english: Heterocycle is always pyrimidine or triazine.
sentences.chinese: 其中雜環部分常爲嘧啶環或均三嗪環。

sentences.english: Then they timed the reactions that caused the new thymine bonds to form.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們記錄了產生新的胸腺嘧啶鍵形成的反應。

sentences.english: Diabetic mouse models were established by intravenous injection of alloxan tetrahydrate.
sentences.chinese: 四氧嘧啶尾靜脈注射製作糖尿病小鼠模型。

sentences.english: METHODS The diabetic models of mice were induced by alloxan.
sentences.chinese: 用四氧嘧啶製作小鼠糖尿病模型。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the anti-neoplastic effect of Haimiding and its mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究海嘧啶抗胃癌作用及作用機制。

sentences.english: A sterility test method for the Compound Sulfadiazine Zinc Cream was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立複方磺胺嘧啶鋅乳膏無菌檢查法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the preparation of fluorouracil loaded chitosan microspheres.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備氟尿嘧啶殼聚糖微球。

sentences.english: There are several options to deliver the cytosine gene.
sentences.chinese: 有幾個選項，以提供胞嘧啶基因。

sentences.english: The patients recovered after taking pyrantel pamoate and chalybeatus.
sentences.chinese: 病人口服雙萘羥酸噻嘧啶及鐵劑後痊癒。

sentences.english: The control group(81 patients )received fluorouracil polyphase liposome perorally.
sentences.chinese: 對照組81例給予複方氟脲嘧啶多相質液口服。

sentences.english: The patient received oral itraconazole and 5 FC and showed favorable effect.
sentences.chinese: 口服伊曲康唑和5氟胞嘧啶有明顯效果。

sentences.english: Toxic effects of capecitabine and fluorouracil were similar.
sentences.chinese: 卡培他濱和氟尿嘧啶的毒副作用相似。

sentences.english: Method i. v injection with alloxan.
sentences.chinese: 方法四氧嘧啶尾靜脈注射。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the efficacy of 5′ DFUR with that of 5 Fu in advanced digestive tract cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較氟鐵龍與氟脲嘧啶對晚期消化道癌的療效。

sentences.english: The model of diabetes mellitus was built with Alloxan in mice.
sentences.chinese: 本文用四氧嘧啶建造糖尿病小鼠實驗模型。

definition: thymine nucleotide (T, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in DNA)
adenine nucleotide (A, pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA and with uracil U 尿嘧啶 in RNA)
guanine nucleotide (G, pairs with cytosine C 胞嘧啶 in DNA and RNA)
cytosine nucleotide (C, pairs with guanine G 鳥嘌呤|鸟嘌呤 in DNA and RNA)
uracil nucleotide (U, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in RNA)
